GABR.CO.summary: Gabriel Holding A/S develops, manufactures, and sells upholstery fabrics, components, upholstered surfaces, and related products and services. It operates through two segments, Fabrics and Letting of Office Facilities. The Fabrics segment offers concern furniture fabrics and related textile products to manufacturers and users in upholstered furniture, seats, and upholstered surfaces. The Letting of Office Facilities segment lets office premises in Aalborg. It operates in Denmark, Germany, the United States, Mexico, Asia, and Other European countries. Gabriel Holding A/S was founded in 1851 and is based in Aalborg, Denmark.
